title: Chapter 1032 - Giving The Ye Family A Funeral Bell!
volume_title: Sword In Hand, He Stands Above The Wilds, Sovereign Throughout The Ages
body:
Chapter 1032 - Giving The Ye Family A Funeral Bell!

Within a palace on Kunwu Mountain.

Ye Feng’s eyes lit up, and his heart filled with irrepressible, fiery desire.

The young woman in white was covered in blood, and her hair was disheveled, but that still couldn’t hide her shocking beauty. Her features were exquisite, and her skin was lustrous and snowy. In her unconscious state, she was a touching sight; it was hard not to take pity on her.

Ye Feng’s gaze traced the curves of her impressive, delicate figure. He couldn’t help but gulp, and throughout his body, his blood stirred.

Deacon Ye Nanhe stood to the side, taking in Ye Feng’s expressions. He couldn’t help but laugh. “Feng’er, what do you think of this dual cultivation vessel?”

Ye Feng applauded and exclaimed, “The Little Sword Demon really is the most beautiful woman of the Azure Continent’s younger generation. A stunner like this really does seem like a lady immortal banished from the heavens. Few in this world can compare to her!”

Ye Nanhe burst into laughter. “I’m just glad you’re satisfied. In a bit, I’ll teach you how to control the Spirit Tether Devilworm. Once I do, this Little Sword Demon will obey your every command, and you can do...
original_title: Chapter 1032 - Giving the Ye Family a Funeral Bell!
